```{python}
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

np.random.seed(42)
data = pd.DataFrame(np.random.rand(100), columns=['Random Numbers'])

def preview_data(df):
    combined_list = []
    combined_list.append(df.head())
    combined_list.append(df.describe())
    return combined_list

preview_data(data)
```
